rules.natural: If the food truck requires inspection, then it is operating.
Provided that the food truck commits a minor violation, it is not the case that it violates regulations.
The food truck commits a minor violation or it commits a major violation.
In the event that the food truck commits a major violation, it does not violate regulations.
Whenever the food truck commits a temperature violation, it is not the case that it violates regulations.
Either the food truck commits a temperature violation or it commits a sanitation violation.
Suspension is ordered for the food truck, or if it is not the case that when it commits a sanitation violation then it does not violate regulations, a warning is issued to the food truck.
If the inspector approves the food truck, then suspension is not ordered for the food truck.
Provided that the supervisor confirms the food truck, the inspector approves the food truck.

If the food truck undergoes a first inspection, then whenever it is not the case that if it violates regulations then corrective action is taken for the food truck, a fine is levied on the food truck.

In the event that the food truck undergoes a follow-up inspection, then under the condition that it is not the case that if it violates regulations then corrective action is taken for the food truck, a fine is levied on the food truck.
Whenever the food truck undergoes a routine check, then if it is not the case that it undergoes a first inspection or it undergoes a follow-up inspection, it undergoes a comprehensive review.

Provided that the food truck undergoes a complaint investigation, then in the event that it is not the case that it undergoes a first inspection or it undergoes a follow-up inspection, it undergoes a comprehensive review.
The food truck operates legally, or if it does not require inspection, then it has a valid permit.
If the food truck passes the health inspection, then it receives a certificate.
The food truck passes the health inspection or it fails the health inspection.
In the event that the food truck fails the health inspection, it is not the case that it operates legally.
Whenever the food truck receives a certificate, it does not operate legally.
Under the condition that the food truck serves alcohol, it has a liquor license.
The food truck serves alcohol or it is operating.
Provided that the food truck violates regulations, it is not the case that corrective action is taken for the food truck.
The food truck violates regulations or it does not have a liquor license.
In the event that it is not the case that if the food truck commits a sanitation violation then it does not violate regulations, it is not the case that a warning is issued to the food truck.
Provided that it is not the case that the food truck undergoes a first inspection or it undergoes a follow-up inspection, it is not the case that it undergoes a comprehensive review.
If it is not the case that the food truck is subject to emergency closure or it undergoes a routine check or it undergoes a complaint investigation, a public notice is issued for the food truck.

Under the condition that it is not the case that the food truck is subject to emergency closure or it undergoes a routine check or it undergoes a complaint investigation, it is not the case that a public notice is issued for the food truck.

(A1 → G).natural: If the food truck requires inspection, then it is operating.

(A10 → ¬A9).natural: Provided that the food truck commits a minor violation, it is not the case that it violates regulations.

(A10 ∨ A11).natural: The food truck commits a minor violation or it commits a major violation.

(A11 → ¬A9).natural: In the event that the food truck commits a major violation, it does not violate regulations.

(A12 → ¬A9).natural: Whenever the food truck commits a temperature violation, it is not the case that it violates regulations.

(A12 ∨ A13).natural: Either the food truck commits a temperature violation or it commits a sanitation violation.

(A13 → ¬A9).natural: Under the condition that the food truck commits a sanitation violation, it does not violate regulations.

(A15 ∨ (¬(A13 → ¬A9) → A14)).natural: Suspension is ordered for the food truck, or if it is not the case that when it commits a sanitation violation then it does not violate regulations, a warning is issued to the food truck.

(A16 → ¬A15).natural: If the inspector approves the food truck, then suspension is not ordered for the food truck.

(A17 → A16).natural: Provided that the supervisor confirms the food truck, the inspector approves the food truck.

(A20 → (¬(A9 → A18) → A19)).natural: If the food truck undergoes a first inspection, then whenever it is not the case that if it violates regulations then corrective action is taken for the food truck, a fine is levied on the food truck.

(A20 ∨ A21).natural: The food truck undergoes a first inspection or it undergoes a follow-up inspection.

(A21 → (¬(A9 → A18) → A19)).natural: In the event that the food truck undergoes a follow-up inspection, then under the condition that it is not the case that if it violates regulations then corrective action is taken for the food truck, a fine is levied on the food truck.

(A23 → (¬(A20 ∨ A21) → A22)).natural: Whenever the food truck undergoes a routine check, then if it is not the case that it undergoes a first inspection or it undergoes a follow-up inspection, it undergoes a comprehensive review.

(A23 ∨ A24).natural: The food truck undergoes a routine check or it undergoes a complaint investigation.

(A24 → (¬(A20 ∨ A21) → A22)).natural: Provided that the food truck undergoes a complaint investigation, then in the event that it is not the case that it undergoes a first inspection or it undergoes a follow-up inspection, it undergoes a comprehensive review.

(A25 ∨ (A23 ∨ A24)).natural: The food truck is subject to emergency closure, or it undergoes a routine check, or it undergoes a complaint investigation.

(A3 ∨ (¬A1 → A2)).natural: The food truck operates legally, or if it does not require inspection, then it has a valid permit.

(A6 → ¬A3).natural: Whenever the food truck receives a certificate, it does not operate legally.

(A7 → A8).natural: Under the condition that the food truck serves alcohol, it has a liquor license.
